CustomField.description: Enable this setting to display the ‘Sender Signs Only’ option as read-only in the Recipients section of the Agreement page. This setting works in conjunction with the Enable Sender Signs Only setting.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enable this setting to display the ‘Sender Signs Only’ option as read-only in the Recipients section of the Agreement page. This setting works in conjunction with the Enable Sender Signs Only setting.
CustomField.label: Read Only Sender Signs Only
